import React, { useContext } from 'react' import BtnRender from './BtnRender' import Heart from '../../../../img/heart2.svg' import { GlobalState } from '../../../../GlobalState' function ProductItem({product, isAdmin, deleteProduct, handleCheck}) { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const addWishList = state.userAPI.addWishList return (
{ isAdmin && handleCheck(product._id)} /> }

{product.title}

${product.price}

{product.description}

addWishList(product)}>
) } export default ProductItem
